TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Information extends System.Object

summary.span: 模块包含用于返回、测试或验证信息的过程。

span.span: The module contains the procedures used to return, test for, or verify information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此模块支持的 Visual Basic 语言关键字和运行时库成员，它们提供的错误信息、 验证数据、 确定数组边界和检索数据类型和颜色信息。This module supports the Visual Basic language keywords and run-time library members that provide error information, validate data, determine array bounds, and retrieve data type and color information. ## Examples 下面的示例使用`VbTypeName`函数以返回数据的多个变量的类型名称。The following example uses the `VbTypeName` function to return data type names for several variables. ```vb Dim sysDateName As String = "System.DateTime" Dim sysShortName As String = "Int16" Dim sysBadName As String = "Nonsense" Dim testVbName As String testVbName = VbTypeName(sysDateName) ' Returns "Date". testVbName = VbTypeName(sysShortName) ' Returns "Short". testVbName = VbTypeName(sysBadName) ' Returns Nothing. ```

related.span: Visual Basic 运行时库成员

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static int32 Erl() cil managed

summary.span: 返回指示上一条执行语句的行号的整数。

span.span: Returns an integer indicating the line number of the last executed statement.

returns.span: 返回指示上一条执行语句的行号的整数。

span.span: Returns an integer indicating the line number of the last executed statement.

returns.span: 只读。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 Visual Basic 遇到无行号，则返回 0。If Visual Basic encounters no line numbers, it returns 0. ## Examples 此示例使用`Erl`属性以指示的行号。This example uses the `Erl` property to indicate the line number. [!code-vb[VbVbalrErrorHandling#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrErrorHandling/VB/Class1.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static class Microsoft.VisualBasic.ErrObject Err() cil managed

summary.span: 包含运行时错误的相关信息。

returns.span: 包含运行时错误的相关信息。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性`Err`对象设置的错误生成器 — Visual Basic、 一个对象或编程人员。The properties of the `Err` object are set by the generator of an error—Visual Basic, an object, or the programmer. 运行时错误发生时，属性的`Err`对象的唯一标识错误的信息填充，并可用于处理错误。When a run-time error occurs, the properties of the `Err` object are filled with information that uniquely identifies the error and that you can use to handle the error. 若要在代码中生成运行时错误，请使用`Raise`方法。To generate a run-time error in your code, use the `Raise` method. `Err`对象的属性将重置为零个或零长度字符串 ("") 后`Exit Sub`， `Exit Function`， `Exit Property`，或`Resume Next`错误处理例程中的语句。The `Err` object's properties are reset to zero or zero-length strings ("") after an `Exit Sub`, `Exit Function`, `Exit Property`, or `Resume Next` statement within an error-handling routine. 使用的任何窗体`Resume`之外的错误处理例程的语句将不会重置`Err`对象的属性。Using any form of the `Resume` statement outside of an error-handling routine will not reset the `Err` object's properties. 可以使用`Clear`方法来显式重置`Err`。You can use the `Clear` method to explicitly reset `Err`. 使用`Raise`方法而不是`Error`语句产生运行时错误的系统错误和类模块。Use the `Raise` method rather than the `Error` statement to generate run-time errors for system errors and class modules. 您决定是否使用`Raise`中其他代码的方法取决于你想要返回的信息的丰富功能。Your decision about whether to use the `Raise` method in other code depends on the richness of the information you want to return. `Err`对象是具有全局作用域的内部对象。The `Err` object is an intrinsic object with global scope. 因此，不需要在代码中创建它的一个实例。Therefore, you do not need to create an instance of it in your code. ## Examples 此示例使用的属性`Err`构造一个错误消息对话框中的对象。This example uses the properties of the `Err` object in constructing an error-message dialog box. 请注意，如果您使用`Clear`方法首先，当您生成与 Visual Basic 错误`Raise`方法中，Visual Basic 的默认值将成为属性的`Err`对象。Notice that if you use the `Clear` method first, when you generate a Visual Basic error with the `Raise` method, Visual Basic's default values become the properties of the `Err` object. [!code-vb[VbVbalrErrorHandling#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrErrorHandling/VB/Class1.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static bool IsArray(object VarName) cil managed
Public Function IsArray (VarName As Object) As Boolean

summary.span: 返回一个 值，指示变量是否指向数组。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether a variable points to an array.

returns.span: 返回一个 值，指示变量是否指向数组。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether a variable points to an array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `IsArray` 返回`True`如果该变量指向的数组; 否则，它将返回`False`。`IsArray` returns `True` if the variable points to an array; otherwise, it returns `False`. `IsArray` 是使用可能包含数组的对象特别有用。`IsArray` is especially useful with objects that might contain arrays. ## Examples 此示例使用`IsArray`函数来检查多个变量是否引用数组。This example uses the `IsArray` function to check if several variables refer to an array. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#34](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#34)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static bool IsDate(object Expression) cil managed
Public Function IsDate (Expression As Object) As Boolean

summary.span: 返回一个 值，该值指示表达式是否表示一个有效的 值。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether an expression represents a valid value.

returns.span: 返回一个 值，该值指示表达式是否表示一个有效的 值。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether an expression represents a valid value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `IsDate` 返回`True`如果`Expression`属于数据类型或可以转换为它; 否则为它将返回`False`。`IsDate` returns `True` if `Expression` is of the data type or can be converted to it; otherwise, it returns `False`. 数据类型保存日期值和时间值。The data type holds both a date value and a time value. `IsDate` 返回`True`如果`Expression`表示有效的日期、 有效的时间，或有效的日期和时间。`IsDate` returns `True` if `Expression` represents a valid date, a valid time, or a valid date and time. ## Examples 下面的示例使用`IsDate`函数来确定多个变量表示有效值。The following example uses the `IsDate` function to determine if several variables represent valid values. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#35](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#35)] 在前面的示例中，`IsDate`将返回`True`的前四个调用和`False`的最后一个调用。In the preceding example, `IsDate` returns `True` for the first four calls and `False` for the last call.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static bool IsDBNull(object Expression) cil managed
Public Function IsDBNull (Expression As Object) As Boolean

summary.span: 返回一个 值，指示表达式的计算结果是否为 类。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether an expression evaluates to the class.

returns.span: 返回一个 值，指示表达式的计算结果是否为 类。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether an expression evaluates to the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `IsDBNull` 返回`True`的数据类型的`Expression`的计算结果为类型; 否则为`IsDBNull`返回`False`。`IsDBNull` returns `True` if the data type of `Expression` evaluates to the type; otherwise, `IsDBNull` returns `False`. 值，该值指示`Object`表示缺失或不存在的数据。The value indicates that the `Object` represents missing or nonexistent data. `DBNull` 不是与相同`Nothing`，指示变量尚未初始化。`DBNull` is not the same as `Nothing`, which indicates that a variable has not yet been initialized. `DBNull` 此外不是一个零长度字符串相同 (`""`)，这有时称为 null 字符串。`DBNull` is also not the same as a zero-length string (`""`), which is sometimes referred to as a null string. ## Examples 此示例使用`IsDBNull`函数来确定变量计算结果为`DBNull`。This example uses the `IsDBNull` function to determine if a variable evaluates to `DBNull`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#36](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#36)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static bool IsError(object Expression) cil managed
Public Function IsError (Expression As Object) As Boolean

summary.span: 返回一个 值，指示表达式是否是异常类型。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether an expression is an exception type.

returns.span: 返回一个 值，指示表达式是否是异常类型。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether an expression is an exception type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `IsError` 返回`True`如果表达式表示`Object`派生的变量类中命名空间。`IsError` returns `True` if the expression represents an `Object` variable that derives from the class in the namespace. 派生的异常可以通过捕获`Try...Catch...Finally`语句。An exception that derives from can be caught with the `Try...Catch...Finally` statements. ## Examples 下面的示例使用`IsError`函数来检查表达式是否表示系统异常。The following example uses the `IsError` function to check if an expression represents a system exception. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#37](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#37)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static bool IsNothing(object Expression) cil managed
Public Function IsNothing (Expression As Object) As Boolean

summary.span: 返回一个 值，指示表达式是否未被指派对象。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether an expression has no object assigned to it.

returns.span: 返回一个 值，指示表达式是否未被指派对象。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether an expression has no object assigned to it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `IsNothing` 返回`True`如果表达式表示当前对象分配给它; 否则为没有的对象变量，它将返回`False`。`IsNothing` returns `True` if the expression represents an object variable that currently has no object assigned to it; otherwise, it returns `False`. `IsNothing` 被应作用于引用类型。`IsNothing` is intended to work on reference types. 值类型不能保存的值，并还原为其默认值，如果将分配`Nothing`到它。A value type cannot hold a value of and reverts to its default value if you assign `Nothing` to it. 如果您提供了中的值类型`Expression`，`IsNothing`始终返回`False`。If you supply a value type in `Expression`, `IsNothing` always returns `False`. ## Examples 下面的示例使用`IsNothing`函数来确定对象变量是否与任何对象实例相关联。The following example uses the `IsNothing` function to determine if an object variable is associated with any object instance. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#38](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#38)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static bool IsNumeric(object Expression) cil managed
Public Function IsNumeric (Expression As Object) As Boolean

summary.span: 返回一个 值，指示表达式的计算结果是否为数字。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether an expression can be evaluated as a number.

returns.span: 返回一个 值，指示表达式的计算结果是否为数字。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether an expression can be evaluated as a number.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `IsNumeric` 返回`True`的数据类型的`Expression`是`Boolean`， `Byte`， `Decimal`， `Double`， `Integer`， `Long`， `SByte`， `Short`， `Single`， `UInteger`，`ULong`，或`UShort`。`IsNumeric` returns `True` if the data type of `Expression` is `Boolean`, `Byte`, `Decimal`, `Double`, `Integer`, `Long`, `SByte`, `Short`, `Single`, `UInteger`, `ULong`, or `UShort`. 它还会返回`True`如果`Expression`是`Char`， `String`，或`Object`可以成功转换为数字。It also returns `True` if `Expression` is a `Char`, `String`, or `Object` that can be successfully converted to a number. `Expression` 可以包含非数字字符。`Expression` can contain non-numeric characters. `IsNumeric` 返回`True`如果`Expression`是包含有效的十六进制或八进制数字的字符串。`IsNumeric` returns `True` if `Expression` is a string that contains a valid hexadecimal or octal number. `IsNumeric` 也会返回`True`如果`Expression`包含开头的有效数值表达式 +、-字符或包含逗号。`IsNumeric` also returns `True` if `Expression` contains a valid numeric expression that begins with a + or - character or contains commas. `IsNumeric` 返回`False`如果`Expression`的数据类型`Date`。`IsNumeric` returns `False` if `Expression` is of data type `Date`. 它将返回`False`如果`Expression`是`Char`， `String`，或`Object`无法成功转换为数字。It returns `False` if `Expression` is a `Char`, `String`, or `Object` that cannot be successfully converted to a number. ## Examples 下面的示例使用`IsNumeric`函数来确定是否可以作为数字计算变量的内容。The following example uses the `IsNumeric` function to determine if the contents of a variable can be evaluated as a number. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#39](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#39)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static bool IsReference(object Expression) cil managed
Public Function IsReference (Expression As Object) As Boolean

summary.span: 返回一个 值，指示表达式是否为引用类型。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether an expression evaluates to a reference type.

returns.span: 返回一个 值，指示表达式是否为引用类型。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether an expression evaluates to a reference type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `IsReference` 返回`True`如果`Expression`表示引用类型，如类实例，`String`类型或数组的任何类型; 否则，它将返回`False`。`IsReference` returns `True` if `Expression` represents a reference type, such as a class instance, a `String` type, or an array of any type; otherwise, it returns `False`. 引用类型包含指向其他位置存储在内存中数据的指针。A reference type contains a pointer to data stored elsewhere in memory. 值类型包含其自己的数据。A value type contains its own data. ## Examples 此示例使用`IsReference`函数来检查是否多个变量，请参阅为引用类型。This example uses the `IsReference` function to check if several variables refer to reference types. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#40)] 在前面的示例中前, 三个调用`IsReference`返回`True`。In the preceding example, the first three calls to `IsReference` return `True`. 最后一次调用返回`False`，这是因为`Integer`是值类型，而不是引用类型。The last call returns `False`, because `Integer` is a value type, not a reference type.

MemberSignature.Value: public static int LBound (Array Array, int Rank = 1);
.method public static int32 LBound(class System.Array Array, int32 Rank) cil managed
static member LBound : Array * int -> int

param.name: Array
param.span: 希望在其中找到维度的最小可能下标的数组。

span.span: The array in which you want to find the lowest possible subscript of a dimension.

param.name: Rank
param.span: 将返回其最小可用下标的维度。

span.span: The dimension for which the lowest possible subscript is to be returned.

param.span: 对第一维使用 1，对第二维使用 2，依此类推。

span.span: Use 1 for the first dimension, 2 for the second, and so on.

param.span: 如果省略 Rank，则假定为 1。

span.span: If Rank is omitted, 1 is assumed.

summary.span: 返回数组的指示维度的最小可用下标。

span.span: Returns the lowest available subscript for the indicated dimension of an array.

returns.span: 指定维度的下标可以包含的最小值。

span.span: The lowest value the subscript for the specified dimension can contain.

returns.span: 只要 已初始化，即使其中没有元素（例如，它是一个零长度字符串）， 也始终返回 0。

span.span: always returns 0 as long as has been initialized, even if it has no elements, for example if it is a zero-length string.

returns.span: 如果 为 ，则 将引发 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于数组下标从 0 开始，因此每一维度最小可用的下标总是为 0。Since array subscripts start at 0, the lowest available subscript for every dimension is always 0. 对于与以下维度数组`LBound`下表中返回的值：For an array with the following dimensions, `LBound` returns the values in the following table: ```vb Dim a(100, 5, 4) As Byte ``` |调用到 LBoundCall to LBound|返回值Return value| |--------------------|------------------| |`LBound(a, 1)`|00| |`LBound(a, 2)`|00| |`LBound(a, 3)`|00| ## Examples 下面的示例使用`LBound`函数来确定数组的指示维度最小可用下标。The following example uses the `LBound` function to determine the lowest available subscript for the indicated dimension of an array. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#41](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#41)]

exception.span: 小于 1，或 大于 的级别。

span.span: less than 1, or is greater than the rank of .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static int32 QBColor(int32 Color) cil managed
Public Function QBColor (Color As Integer) As Integer

span.span: A whole number in the range 0–15.

summary.span: 返回一个 值，表示与指定的颜色编号对应的 RGB 颜色代码。

span.span: Returns an value representing the RGB color code corresponding to the specified color number.

returns.span: 返回一个 值，表示与指定的颜色编号对应的 RGB 颜色代码。

span.span: Returns an value representing the RGB color code corresponding to the specified color number.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从最低有效字节开始，返回的值指定用于在使用 Visual Basic 语言的 RGB 系统中设置适当的颜色的红色、 绿色和蓝色值。Starting with the least-significant byte, the returned value specifies the red, green, and blue values used to set the appropriate color in the RGB system used by the Visual Basic language. `Color`自变量具有这些设置。The `Color` argument has these settings. |数字Number|颜色Color|数字Number|颜色Color| |------------|-----------|------------|-----------| |00|黑色Black|88|灰色Gray| |11|蓝色Blue|99|浅蓝色Light blue| |22|绿色Green|1010|浅绿色Light green| |33|蓝绿色Cyan|1111|浅青色Light cyan| |44|红色Red|1212|浅红色Light red| |55|洋红色Magenta|1313|浅洋红色Light magenta| |66|黄色Yellow|1414|淡黄色Light yellow| |77|白色White|1515|亮白色Bright white| ## Examples 此示例使用`QBColor`函数来更改颜色由`colorInteger`。This example uses the `QBColor` function to change to the color indicated by `colorInteger`. `QBColor` 接受 0 到 15 之间的整数值。`QBColor` accepts integer values between 0 and 15. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#29](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#29)]

exception.span: 不在 0 到 15（均含）范围之内。

span.span: is outside of range 0 to 15, inclusive.

MemberSignature.Value: public static int RGB (int Red, int Green, int Blue);
.method public static int32 RGB(int32 Red, int32 Green, int32 Blue) cil managed
Public Function RGB (Red As Integer, Green As Integer, Blue As Integer) As Integer
public: static int RGB(int Red, int Green, int Blue);
static member RGB : int * int * int -> int

param.name: Red
param.span: 0–255 范围内（均含）的 值。表示颜色中红色分量的强度。

span.span: in the range 0–255, inclusive, that represents the intensity of the red component of the color.

param.name: Green
param.span: 0–255 范围内（均含）的 值。表示颜色中绿色分量的强度。

span.span: in the range 0–255, inclusive, that represents the intensity of the green component of the color.

param.name: Blue
param.span: 0–255 范围内（均含）的 值。表示颜色中蓝色分量的强度。

span.span: in the range 0–255, inclusive, that represents the intensity of the blue component of the color.

summary.span: 返回一个 值，表示由一组红色、绿色和蓝色分量形成的 RGB 颜色值。

span.span: Returns an value representing an RGB color value from a set of red, green and blue color components.

returns.span: 返回一个 值，表示由一组红色、绿色和蓝色分量形成的 RGB 颜色值。

span.span: Returns an value representing an RGB color value from a set of red, green and blue color components.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序的方法和属性接受颜色规范的预期规范是一个数字代表 RGB 颜色值。Application methods and properties that accept a color specification expect that specification to be a number representing an RGB color value. RGB 颜色值指定相对强度的红色、 绿色和蓝色的会导致特定颜色显示。An RGB color value specifies the relative intensity of red, green, and blue to cause a specific color to be displayed. 如果任何参数的值`RGB`大于 255，255 使用。If the value for any argument to `RGB` is greater than 255, 255 is used. 下表列出了一些标准颜色以及它们包含的红色、 绿色和蓝色值。The following table lists some standard colors and the red, green, and blue values they include. |颜色Color|红色值Red value|绿色值Green value|蓝色的值Blue value| |-----------|---------------|-----------------|----------------| |黑色Black|00|00|00| |蓝色Blue|00|00|255255| |绿色Green|00|255255|00| |蓝绿色Cyan|00|255255|255255| |红色Red|255255|00|00| |洋红色Magenta|255255|00|255255| |黄色Yellow|255255|255255|00| |白色White|255255|255255|255255| ## Examples 此示例演示如何`RGB`函数用于返回一个整数，表示`RGB`颜色值。This example shows how the `RGB` function is used to return a whole number representing an `RGB` color value. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#18](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#18)]

exception.span: 、，或 不在 0 到 255（含 0 和 255）范围之内。

span.span: , , or is outside of range 0 to 255, inclusive.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static string SystemTypeName(string VbName) cil managed
Public Function SystemTypeName (VbName As String) As String

param.name: VbName
param.span: 一个包含 Visual Basic 类型名称的 变量。

span.span: A variable containing a Visual Basic type name.

summary.span: 返回一个 值，它包含变量的系统数据类型名称。

span.span: Returns a value containing the system data type name of a variable.

returns.span: 返回一个 值，它包含变量的系统数据类型名称。

span.span: Returns a value containing the system data type name of a variable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `SystemTypeName` 返回的完全限定公共语言运行时 (CLR) 类型名称对应于 Visual Basic 类型名称。`SystemTypeName` returns the fully qualified common language runtime (CLR) type name corresponding to the Visual Basic type name. 例如，如果`VbName`包含"日期"`SystemTypeName`返回"System.DateTime"。For example, if `VbName` contains "Date", `SystemTypeName` returns "System.DateTime". 如果`SystemTypeName`不能识别的值`VbName`，它将返回`Nothing`(不是字符串"Nothing")。If `SystemTypeName` does not recognize the value of `VbName`, it returns `Nothing` (not the string "Nothing"). ## Examples 下面的示例使用`SystemTypeName`函数以返回数据的多个变量的类型名称。The following example uses the `SystemTypeName` function to return data type names for several variables. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#49](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#49)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static string TypeName(object VarName) cil managed
Public Function TypeName (VarName As Object) As String

param.name: VarName
param.span: 如果 为 ，则可以传递除结构之外的任何数据类型的变量。

span.span: If is , you can pass a variable of any data type except a structure.

summary.span: 返回一个 值，它包含变量的数据类型信息。

span.span: Returns a value containing data-type information about a variable.

returns.span: 返回一个 值，它包含变量的数据类型信息。

span.span: Returns a value containing data-type information about a variable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表显示`String`返回的值`TypeName`不同内容的`VarName`。The following table shows the `String` values returned by `TypeName` for different contents of `VarName`. |`VarName` 内容`VarName` contents|返回的字符串String returned| |------------------------|---------------------| |16 位`True`或`False`值类型16-bit `True` or `False` value type|"Boolean""Boolean"| |8 位二进制值类型8-bit binary value type|"字节""Byte"| |16 位字符的值类型16-bit character value type|"Char""Char"| |64 位日期和时间值类型64-bit date and time value type|"日期""Date"| |指示缺少或不存在的数据的引用类型Reference type indicating missing or nonexistent data|"DBNull""DBNull"| |128 位定点数值类型128-bit fixed-point numeric value type|"Decimal""Decimal"| |64 位浮点型数值类型64-bit floating-point numeric value type|"Double""Double"| |32 位整数值类型32-bit integer value type|"整数""Integer"| |指向未专用化的对象的引用类型Reference type pointing to an unspecialized object|"对象""Object"| |指向从类创建一个专用对象引用类型*objectclass*Reference type pointing to a specialized object created from class *objectclass*|"*objectclass*""*objectclass*"| |64 位整数值类型64-bit integer value type|"Long""Long"| |当前分配给它的任何对象的引用类型Reference type with no object currently assigned to it|"Nothing""Nothing"| |8 位有符号的整数值类型8-bit signed integer value type|"SByte""SByte"| |16 位整数值类型16-bit integer value type|"Short""Short"| |32 位浮点型数值类型32-bit floating-point numeric value type|"单个""Single"| |指向的 16 位字符的字符串的引用类型Reference type pointing to a string of 16-bit characters|"String""String"| |32 位无符号的整数值类型32-bit unsigned integer value type|"UInteger""UInteger"| |64 位无符号的整数值类型64-bit unsigned integer value type|"ULong""ULong"| |16 位无符号的整数值类型16-bit unsigned integer value type|"UShort""UShort"| 如果`VarName`是一个数组，则返回的字符串可以是任何一对空括号前面表中的字符串。If `VarName` is an array, the returned string can be any one of the strings in the preceding table with empty parentheses appended. 例如，如果`VarName`指向一个整数，数组`TypeName`返回"Integer()"。For example, if `VarName` points to an array of integers, `TypeName` returns "Integer()". 当`TypeName`返回引用类型的名称如类，它将返回仅名称本身，而不是限定名称。When `TypeName` returns the name of a reference type such as a class, it returns only the name itself, not the qualified name. 例如，如果`VarName`指向类的对象，`TypeName`返回"PaperSource"。For example, if `VarName` points to an object of class , `TypeName` returns "PaperSource". 请注意，如果声明为特定类类型的变量，但不具有分配给它的对象`TypeName`返回"Nothing"。Note that if the variable is declared to be of a certain class type but does not have an object assigned to it, `TypeName` returns "Nothing". ## Examples 下面的示例使用`TypeName`函数以返回有关多个变量的数据类型信息。The following example uses the `TypeName` function to return data type information about several variables. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#52](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#52)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static int UBound (Array Array, int Rank = 1);
.method public static int32 UBound(class System.Array Array, int32 Rank) cil managed
static member UBound : Array * int -> int

param.name: Array
param.span: 要在其中查找维度的最大可能下标的数组。

span.span: The array in which you want to find the highest possible subscript of a dimension.

param.name: Rank
param.span: 将返回其最大可用下标的维度。

span.span: The dimension for which the highest possible subscript is to be returned.

param.span: 对第一维使用 1，对第二维使用 2，依此类推。

span.span: Use 1 for the first dimension, 2 for the second, and so on.

param.span: 如果省略 Rank，则假定为 1。

span.span: If Rank is omitted, 1 is assumed.

summary.span: 返回数组的指示维度的最大可用下标。

span.span: Returns the highest available subscript for the indicated dimension of an array.

returns.span: 指定维度的下标可以包含的最大值。

span.span: The highest value the subscript for the specified dimension can contain.

returns.span: 如果 只有一个元素，则 返回 0。

span.span: If has only one element, returns 0.

returns.span: 如果 没有元素，例如它是一个零长度字符串，则 返回 -1。

span.span: If has no elements, for example if it is a zero-length string, returns -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于数组下标从 0 开始，维的长度是比该维度的最大可用下标大 1。Since array subscripts start at 0, the length of a dimension is greater by one than the highest available subscript for that dimension. 对于与以下维度数组`UBound`下表中返回的值：For an array with the following dimensions, `UBound` returns the values in the following table: ```vb Dim a(100, 5, 4) As Byte ``` |调用到 UBoundCall to UBound|返回值Return value| |--------------------|------------------| |`UBound(a, 1)`|100100| |`UBound(a, 2)`|55| |`UBound(a, 3)`|44| 可以使用`UBound`来确定总中一个数组，但您的元素数必须调整它返回到一个事实，即下标从 0 开始的帐户的值。You can use `UBound` to determine the total number of elements in an array, but you must adjust the value it returns to account for the fact that the subscripts start at 0. 以下示例计算数组的总大小`a`在前面的示例：The following example calculates the total size of the array `a` in the preceding example: ```vb Dim total As Integer total = (UBound(A, 1) + 1) * (UBound(A, 2) + 1) * (UBound(A, 3) + 1) ``` 计算的值`total`为 3030，这是 101 \* 6 \* 5。The value calculated for `total` is 3030, which is 101 \* 6 \* 5. ## Examples 下面的示例使用`UBound`函数来确定最大可用下标的指示维度的数组。The following example uses the `UBound` function to determine the highest available subscript for the indicated dimension of an array. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#53](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#53)]

exception.span: 小于 1，或 大于 的级别。

span.span: is less than 1, or is greater than the rank of .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.VariantType VarType(object VarName) cil managed
Public Function VarType (VarName As Object) As VariantType

param.name: VarName
param.span: 如果 为 ，则可以传递除结构之外的任何数据类型的变量。

span.span: If is , you can pass a variable of any data type except a structure.

summary.span: 返回一个 值，它包含变量的数据类型分类。

span.span: Returns an value containing the data type classification of a variable.

returns.span: 返回一个 值，它包含变量的数据类型分类。

span.span: Returns an value containing the data type classification of a variable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的整数值`VarType`隶属。The integer value returned by `VarType` is a member of the . 下表显示了返回的值`VarType`的特殊情况的`VarName`。The following table shows the values returned by `VarType` for special cases of `VarName`. |所表示的数据类型 `VarName`Data type represented by `VarName`|返回值 `VarType`Value returned by `VarType`| |----------------------------------------|---------------------------------| |[NothingNothing](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/nothing.md)|`VariantType.Object`| ||`VariantType.Null`| |枚举Enumeration|基础数据类型 (`SByte`， `Byte`， `Short`， `UShort`， `Integer`， `UInteger`， `Long`，或`ULong`)Underlying data type (`SByte`, `Byte`, `Short`, `UShort`, `Integer`, `UInteger`, `Long`, or `ULong`)| |数组Array|位或运算的数组元素类型和 `VariantType.Array`Bitwise OR of array element type and `VariantType.Array`| |数组的数组Array of arrays|按位 OR`VariantType.Object`和 `VariantType.Array`Bitwise OR of `VariantType.Object` and `VariantType.Array`| |结构 ()Structure ()|`VariantType.UserDefinedType`| ||`VariantType.Error`| |未知Unknown|`VariantType.Object`| ## Examples 下面的示例使用`VarType`函数以返回有关多个变量的数据类型分类信息。The following example uses the `VarType` function to return data type classification information about several variables. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#55](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#55)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static string VbTypeName(string UrtName) cil managed
Public Function VbTypeName (UrtName As String) As String

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: UrtName
param.span: 变量，其中包含公共语言运行时所使用的类型名称。

span.span: variable containing a type name used by the common language runtime.

summary.span: 返回一个 值，它包含变量的 Visual Basic 数据类型名称。

span.span: Returns a value containing the Visual Basic data type name of a variable.

returns.span: 返回一个 值，它包含变量的 Visual Basic 数据类型名称。

span.span: Returns a value containing the Visual Basic data type name of a variable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `VbTypeName` 返回与公共语言运行时类型名称相对应的 Visual Basic 类型名称。`VbTypeName` returns the Visual Basic type name corresponding to the common language runtime type name. 例如，如果`UrtName`包含"Int32"或"System.Int32"`VbTypeName`返回"Integer"。For example, if `UrtName` contains "Int32" or "System.Int32", `VbTypeName` returns "Integer". 如果`VbTypeName`不能识别的值`UrtName`，它将返回`Nothing`(不是字符串"Nothing")。If `VbTypeName` does not recognize the value of `UrtName`, it returns `Nothing` (not the string "Nothing"). 中的类型名称`UrtName`可以从各种源，例如从获取属性中的构成的数组类。The type name in `UrtName` can be obtained from various sources, for example from the property in the array of the class. ## Examples 下面的示例使用`VbTypeName`函数以返回数据的多个变量的类型名称。The following example uses the `VbTypeName` function to return data type names for several variables. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#56](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#56)]
